Plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psychics can stop.
Title: Akira
Writer: Katsuhiro Ôtomo (screenplay), Izô Hashimoto (screenplay), Katsuhiro Ôtomo (graphic novel), L. Michael Haller (dialogue), Heidi Wilbur (dialogue), Kevin Seymour (dialogue)
Actors: Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Tesshô Genda
